Earn Gold Coins

Multiple ways to earn coins by contributing quality content and helping the community grow

Publish EA/Indicator
10 coins reward + sales revenue

Upload quality EAs or indicators and set a gold coin price. Earn coins when others download your work.

Share Set Files
5 coins reward + sales revenue

Publish optimized .set configuration files for popular EAs. Help traders get started quickly.

Write Quality Articles
10 coins reward + sales revenue

Create tutorials, strategies, or EA reviews. Set as paid content and earn when others view.

Help Community
1 coin/reply (max 20/day)

Answer questions, provide solutions, and mark helpful replies. Earn 1 coin per reply.

Share Backtest Reports
10 coins (max 3/day)

Post detailed performance reports with verified data. Earn 10 coins per submission.

Report Violations
5-50 coins (max 5/day)

Help keep the community safe by reporting spam, scams, or malicious marketing. Earn 5-25 coins per verified report.

Daily Activity Bonus
1 coin/day + 10 at 7 days + 50 at 30 days

Check in daily to earn 1 coin. Maintain streaks for bonus rewards!

Referral Program
Coming soon

Invite traders to join YoForex. Earn coins when your referrals are active and contribute.

Pro Tip: Quality Over Quantity

High-quality contributions earn more coins and build your reputation. Focus on sharing well-tested EAs, detailed backtests, and helpful tutorials. The community rewards valuable content with more downloads and upvotes!
